    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_b3fd6c40d02f1ae9bc055d03b785d2d6961573fd</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Friction force of a wooden box on a smooth table top</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion Kraft eines hölzernen Kastens auf eine 
glatte Tabelle Oberseite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force de frottement d'un cadre en bois sur un 
dessus de table doux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força da fricção de uma caixa de madeira em um 
alto de tabela liso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza di attrito di una casella di legno su un 
piano d'appoggio regolare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύναμη τριβής ενός ξύλινου κιβωτίου σε μια ομαλή 
επιτραπέζια κορυφή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza de la fricción de un rectángulo de madera
en una tapa de vector lisa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations showing a wooden box sliding across two different surfaces. In this case, the box is placed on top of the smooth table wherein the friction force acting in the opposite direction is less than the pulling force.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pulling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sliding</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">smooth surfaces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">table top</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wooden box</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen, die einen 
hölzernen Kasten schiebt über zwei unterschiedliche Oberflächen 
zeigen. In diesem Fall wird der Kasten auf die glatte Tabelle, 
worin die Friktion Kraft, die in der entgegengesetzten Richtung 
fungiert, kleiner ist, als die ziehende Kraft plaziert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de deux illustrations montrant un 
cadre en bois glissant à travers deux surfaces différentes. 
Dans ce cas-ci, le cadre est placé sur la table lisse où la 
force de frottement agissant dans la direction opposée est moins que 
la force de traction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações que mostram uma 
caixa de madeira que desliza através de duas superfícies diferentes.
Neste caso, a caixa é colocada no alto da tabela lisa wherein a
força da fricção que age no sentido oposto é menos do que a força
puxando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni che mostrano
una casella di legno che fa scorrere attraverso due superfici 
differenti. In questo caso, la casella è disposta in cima alla 
tabella liscia in cui la forza di attrito che si comporta nel senso 
opposto è di meno che la forza tirante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν ξύλινο 
κιβώτιο που γλιστρά σε δύο διαφορετικές επιφάνειες. Σε 
αυτήν την περίπτωση, το πεδίο τοποθετείται πάνω από τον ομαλό 
πίνακα όπου η δύναμη τριβής που ενεργεί στην αντίθετη 
κατεύθυνση είναι λιγότερο από τη δύναμη τραβήγματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones que muestran
un rectángulo de madera que resbala a través de dos diversas 
superficies. En este caso, el rectángulo se coloca encima del 
vector liso en donde la fuerza de la fricción que actúa en la 
dirección opuesta es menos que la fuerza que tira.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ziehen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schieben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">glatte Oberflächen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tabelle Oberseite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hölzerner Kasten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">traction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">glissement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">surfaces douces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dessus de table</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">cadre en bois</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deslizamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">superfícies lisas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">alto de tabela</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">caixa de madeira</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-it">casella di legno</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-el">τράβηγμα</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-el">ολίσθηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ομαλές επιφάνειες</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-es">tapa de vector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rectángulo de madera</string>
          </keyword>
